DatabaseQueries.Name: Technology Portfolio Model
DatabaseQueries.Query:
SELECT DISTINCT L0.SHAPENAME         L0, 
                L0.SHAPETYPENAME     [L0 Shape], 
                L1.SHAPENAME         L1, 
                L1.SHAPETYPENAME     [L1 Shape], 
                L2.SHAPENAME         L2, 
                L2.SHAPETYPENAME     [L2 Shape], 
                L2_L3.FROMOBJECT     L3, 
                L2_L3.FROMOBJECTTYPE [L3 Shape], 
                L3_L4.TOOBJECT       L4, 
                L3_L4.TOOBJECTTYPE   [L4 Shape], 
                L4_L5.TOOBJECT       L5, 
                L4_L5.TOOBJECTTYPE   [L5 Shape], 
                L5_L6.TOOBJECT       L6, 
                L5_L6.TOOBJECTTYPE   [L6 Shape] 
FROM SHAPETYPE.[Technology Service] L0 
         LEFT OUTER JOIN RELATIONSHIPTYPE.[TOGAF: Technology Service is supplied by Logical Technology Component] L0_L1 
                         ON L0.SHAPEID = L0_L1.FROMOBJECTID 
         LEFT OUTER JOIN RELATIONSHIPTYPE.[TOGAF: Technology Component constitutes Technology Component] L1_L2 
                         ON L0_L1.TOOBJECTID = L1_L2.FROMOBJECTID 
         LEFT OUTER JOIN RELATIONSHIPTYPE.[TOGAF: Physical Component realizes Logical Component] L2_L3 
                         ON L1_L2.TOOBJECTID = L2_L3.TOOBJECTID 
         LEFT OUTER JOIN RELATIONSHIPTYPE.[TOGAF: Technology Component constitutes Technology Component] L3_L4 
                         ON L2_L3.FROMOBJECTID = L3_L4.FROMOBJECTID 
         LEFT OUTER JOIN RELATIONSHIPTYPE.[TOGAF: Technology Component constitutes Technology Component] L4_L5 
                         ON L3_L4.TOOBJECTID = L4_L5.FROMOBJECTID 
         LEFT OUTER JOIN RELATIONSHIPTYPE.[TOGAF: Technology Component constitutes Technology Component] L5_L6 
                         ON L4_L5.TOOBJECTID = L5_L6.FROMOBJECTID 
         LEFT OUTER JOIN SHAPETYPE.[Logical Technology Component] L1 ON L1.SHAPEID = L0_L1.TOOBJECTID 
         LEFT OUTER JOIN SHAPETYPE.[Logical Technology Component] L2 ON L2.SHAPEID = L1_L2.TOOBJECTID 
WHERE L0.LIBRARYNAME = 'Baseline Architecture' 
ORDER BY L0, L1, L2, L3, L4, L5, L6;

DatabaseQueries.Name: Application Portfolio Model
DatabaseQueries.Query:
SELECT DISTINCT L0.SHAPENAME     L0,
                L0.SHAPETYPENAME [L0 Shape],
                L1.SHAPENAME     L1,
                L1.SHAPETYPENAME [L1 Shape]
FROM SHAPETYPE.[Logical Application Component] L0
         LEFT OUTER JOIN RELATIONSHIPTYPE.[TOGAF: Physical Component realizes Logical Component] L0_L1
                         ON L0.SHAPEID = L0_L1.TOOBJECTID
         LEFT OUTER JOIN SHAPETYPE.[Physical Application Component] L1 ON L1.SHAPEID = L0_L1.FROMOBJECTID
WHERE L0.LIBRARYNAME = 'Baseline Architecture';
